promtional-produts.name: Hydrating Rose Serum
promtional-produts.description: This lightweight serum is infused with rose water and hyaluronic acid to deeply hydrate and nourish your skin, leaving it feeling plump and dewy.

promtional-produts.name: Glow Boost Moisturizer
promtional-produts.description: This luxurious moisturizer combines vitamin C and vitamin E to brighten your complexion and provide long-lasting hydration. It also protects your skin from free radical damage.

promtional-produts.name: Sparkling Mineral Water Mist
promtional-produts.description: This refreshing mist is formulated with mineral water and botanical extracts to instantly hydrate and revitalize your skin. It's perfect for a midday pick-me-up or to set your makeup.

promtional-produts.name: Nourishing Overnight Mask
promtional-produts.description: This rich and creamy mask works its magic while you sleep. It's packed with hydrating and nourishing ingredients to leave your skin feeling soft, supple, and radiant in the morning.

promtional-produts.name: Exfoliating Fruit Enzyme Mask
promtional-produts.description: This gentle yet effective mask uses fruit enzymes to remove dead skin cells and reveal a brighter, more even complexion. It also helps to boost hydration and leave your skin feeling smooth and refreshed.
